en.content: After a grueling exchange, you land a decisive blow and the man’s legs buckle. He slams to the floor, blood dripping down his apron. His eyes flicker.

text.content: You may check-mark the small box beside the Fighting (Brawl) skill.

zh.content: 激烈的交锋过后，你终于打出致胜一击。他下盘不稳，砰的一声摔到地板上，血从围裙上滴下来。他的眼皮颤抖着。

text.content: 你可以在「格斗 ( 斗殴 )」技能左边的小方框里打勾。

text.en: Interrogate the man about the embalmed bodies
text.zh: 向他盘问防腐尸体的事

text.en: Leave him here and investigate elsewhere
text.zh: 丢下他前往其他地方调查
